computedFields.name: UniqueUserName
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when isDuplicate is null then 'Name' else 'Name' + " (" +'Username'+ ")" end

computedFields.name: Duration
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'ValidToDate' == "3000-01-01T00:00:00.000Z" then     date_diff("second",toDate('ValidFromDate',"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'"), now())     else     date_diff("second",toDate('ValidFromDate',"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'"), toDate('ValidToDate',"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'"))     end
computedFields.label: Duration

computedFields.name: IsClosed
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when daysBetween(toDate(ActivityDate, "yyyy-MM-dd"), now()) >= 0 then "true" else "false" end
computedFields.label: IsClosed

computedFields.name: hasOpportunity
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Opportunity.Name' is null then "false" else "true" end

computedFields.name: CustomFilter
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Opportunity.Name' is null && 'IsActive' == "false" then "false" else "true" end

computedFields.name: UserOrQueueName
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Owner.Name' is null && !('Queue.Name' is null) then 'Queue.Name' when !('Owner.Name' is null) then 'Owner.Name' else "N/A" end
computedFields.label: Owner or Queue Name

computedFields.name: OwnerType
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when 'Owner.Name' is null && !('Queue.Name' is null) then "Queue" when !('Owner.Name' is null) then "User" else "N/A" end
computedFields.label: Owner Type

computedFields.name: LeadAge
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('IsConverted' == "false") then daysBetween(toDate(CreatedDate_sec_epoch), now())  else daysBetween(toDate(ConvertedDate_day_epoch), toDate(CreatedDate_day_epoch))  end
computedFields.label: Lead Age in Days

computedFields.name: OpportunityAge
computedFields.saqlExpression: case when ('ConvertedOpportunity.Name' is null) then 0 when ('ConvertedOpportunity.IsClosed' == "false") then ('CurrentDate_sec_epoch' - 'CreatedDate_sec_epoch')/86400  else ('ConvertedOpportunity.CloseDate_sec_epoch' - 'CreatedDate_sec_epoch')/86400 end
computedFields.label: Total Opportunity Age

computedFields.name: DaysSinceLastActivity
computedFields.saqlExpression: case    when LastActivityDate is null      then daysBetween(toDate(substr(LastModifiedDate, 1, 10), "yyyy-MM-dd"), now())   when LastModifiedDate > LastActivityDate     then daysBetween(toDate(substr(LastModifiedDate, 1, 10), "yyyy-MM-dd"), now())   else daysBetween(toDate(substr(LastActivityDate, 1, 10), "yyyy-MM-dd"), now()) end
computedFields.label: Days Since Last Activity

computedFields.name: OpportunityAge
computedFields.saqlExpression: case    when IsClosed == "false"     then daysBetween(toDate(substr(CreatedDate, 1, 10), "yyyy-MM-dd"), now())     else daysBetween(toDate(substr(CreatedDate, 1, 10), "yyyy-MM-dd"),toDate(substr(CloseDate, 1, 10), "yyyy-MM-dd"))     end
computedFields.label: Opportunity Age
